terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.disclaimer: By accepting, you agree that the nutritional calculations provided by this app are estimates and serve as an initial reference.
terms.section1Text1: We use the Mifflin-St Jeor equation, considered one of the most accurate to estimate your resting calorie burn.
terms.section1Text2: Your BMR is multiplied by an Activity Factor (based on your selection: light, moderate, or intense) to estimate your total daily caloric expenditure.
terms.section1Text3: Calorie and macronutrient goals are adjusted based on your TDEE to align with your objective (lose, maintain, or gain weight).
terms.professionalAdvice: Consult a professional to create a personalized meal plan and link it to your account to boost app performance.
